Intervention.evidence: 285 received NCIT, while 32 received AIT after US.

Objective.evidence: We aimed to contribute to the ongoing discussion regarding adjuvant treatment strategies following neoadjuvant chemoimmunotherapy (NCIT) and adjuvant immunotherapy (AIT) after upfront surgery (US) in patients with resectable non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).

Method_Outcome.evidence: Event-free survival (EFS) and overall survival (OS) were assessed using the Kaplan–Meier method.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Before and after PSM, the IT and ChIT groups demonstrated better EFS compared with the no-treatment group.
